metadata.title: CVE-2022-21949 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference vulnerability inSUSE Open Build Service allows remote attackers to reference externalentities in certain operations. This can be used to gain information fromthe server that can be abused to escalate to Admin privileges on OBS. Thisissue affects: SUSE Open Build Service Open Build Service versions prior to2.10.13.

criterions.comment: ruby-xmlhash: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
